New Records: Dasun Shanaka hammered a 20-ball fastest fifty by an Sri Lankan batsman in T20 international cricket history
Dasun Shanaka's 20-ball fifty is the fastest fifty by an Sri Lankan batsman against India in T20Is
Sri Lanka's 206 was their second highest score against India in T20 international
Sri Lanka's 206 was the highest-score by any team at Pune in T20Is
Dasun Shanaka equalled a joint second most sixes hit in an innings for Sri Lanka in T20 international
Axar Patel equalled a 20-ball joint fifth fastest fifty for India in T20 international
Suryakumar Yadav and Axar Patel set up the record sixth-wicket partnership for India against Sri Lanka in T20 international
Key Match Events: Charith Asalanka and Dasun Shanaka helped take Sri Lanka past 200
Kusal Mendis hammered a 27-ball his third fastest fifty for Sri Lanka in T20 international
80 : Pathum Nissanka and Kusal Mendis set up the second highest first-wicket partnership for Sri Lanka against India in T20 international
68* : Dasun Shanaka and Chamika Karunaratne set up the record seventh-wicket partnership for Sri Lanka against India in T20 international
India best bowler by Umran Malik picked up 3-wickets
Axar Patel hammered a 65 off 31-balls including 6-sixes & 3-fours
Suryakumar Yadav blasted a 51 off 36-balls including 3-sixes & 3-fours
